item.title: Getting Started With Electron
item.description: Registration Link Event Link Electron is a framework for building cross-platform desktop applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. With electron you can use existing web development skills to create desktop applications. Some of the most famous apps that have been made using electron are: Visual Studio Code Twitch Microsoft Teams Whatsapp Desktop Since electron apps use HTML, CSS and JavaScript, you can also use various libraries such as React, Bootstrap, etc.
